ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] To Quest or Not to Quest ? That is the Question ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, all lvl 50ish now very free, nothing to do, can PL u 24 hrs a day to lvl 50.  Isn t it a very attractive incentive for u to come back? ;P Zil On Friday,
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, all lvl 50ish now very free, nothing to do, can PL u 24 hrs a day to
lvl 50. Isn't it a very attractive incentive for u to come back? ;P

Zil

On Friday, 07 April, 2000 3:12 AM, Gabriel Kang
[SMTP:chaotic@...] wrote:
> Hello Everyone !
>
> I just suddently quit EQ in Early January...
> No idea what the hell's been going on except
> everyone i know probably is at 50ish now...
> heheh kinda miss it sometimes... but after playing
> too long it gets monotonous .... the theory of
> "camping" a spot over and over to gain exp is
> kinda boring after a while.... although there is the
> counter argument that every fight is different ...
>
> Anyone care to "pyscho" me back to EQ ?
> I believe my account is still active ...
>
>
> Last Seen as ...
>
> Mezz Meralda in Lanys T'vyl
> Kaen in Erollisi Marr
